app_descript:
App Name: Street Fighter: Duel

Package Name: com.crunchyroll.sfduel

Brief:

Step into the virtual dojo of Street Fighter: Duel, the official mobile game for the legendary Street Fighter series. Immerse yourself in high-octane battles with a harmonious blend of classic gameplay and modern mobile elements. Engage with over 40 iconic characters, each boasting their own fighting styles and awe-inspiring moves, in a visually striking and action-packed journey to dismantle the nefarious Shadaloo organization.
